mapper.update:
update rpm_pkg_base set security = CASE WHEN substring(sub_path, 1, 4) = 'EPOL' THEN 'epol' WHEN substring(sub_path, 1, 10) = 'everything' THEN 'L4' WHEN substring(sub_path, 1, 2) = 'OS' THEN 'L3' end;
update rpm_pkg_base rpm, rpm_maintain_level lel set rpm.security = lel.security_level where upper(rpm.name) = upper(lel.name) and substring(rpm.sub_path, 1, 10) = lel.sub_path or substring(rpm.sub_path, 1, 2) = upper(substring(lel.sub_path, 5, 6));
